title: Autosave
desc: Automatically creates a savegame upon completing a mission.

title: Traffic
desc: Randomizes cars that spawn on traffic including law enforcement vehicles.

title: Parked Cars
desc: Randomizes cars which are found parked around the map including airplanes at airports with entirely random spawns.

title: Script Vehicles
desc: Randomizes the vehicles you are given in missions. The randomizer makes sure that you get vehicles that are usable for the mission.

title: Colours
desc: Randomizes the colours of various in-game elements, including cars, the HUD, and fades.

title: Missions
desc: Randomizes which mission is started by each mission marker. When the randomized mission is complete, the game progresses as if you completed the original.

title: Weapons
desc: Randomizes the weapons that are dropped/wielded by the player/enemies.

title: Pickups
desc: Randomizes weapon pickups scattered around the map, as well as the appearance of certain other types of pickups.

title: Voice Lines
desc: Randomizes dialogues spoken by characters in missions.

title: Cutscenes
desc: Randomizes the models used in motion-captured cutscenes, as well as the location in which they take place.

title: Blips
desc: Randomizes every radar blip on the map with a different icon.

title: Police Helicopters
desc: Randomizes the helicopters that the police spawn in with working spotlight and gun.

title: DYOM
desc: Adds an option to download and play a random mission from the DYOM (Design Your Own Mission) website.

title: Clothes
desc: Randomizes clothes every fade.

title: Cheat
desc: Randomizes which cheat activates when you enter a cheat.

title: License Plate
desc: Randomizes the license plates of vehicles to a random word.

title: Handling
desc: Shuffles the handlings of vehicles.

title: Particles
desc: Randomizes all of the game's particle effects.

title: Weapon Stats
desc: Randomizes properties of all weapons, including their damage, fire rate, and clip size.

title: Objects
desc: Randomizes objects spawned by mission scripts into other objects.

title: Wanted Level
desc: Randomizes how you get wanted level during and outside missions.

title: Respawn Point
desc: Randomizes where you respawn after getting busted or wasted.

title: Pager
desc: Randomizes messages received through the pager/beeper.

title: Chunk
desc: Randomizes chunks of the map for a unique world layout.
